property.name: pathType
property.label: Type of the path.
property.description: The type of path you wanted to show. Valid values are base, path

property.name: values
property.label: The picklist field values
property.description: provide all the picklist api name comma separated

property.name: buttonLocation
property.label: Location of the button
property.description: Where you wanted to display the button. The valid values are Top, SameRow

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: The Label of the button
property.description: The Label of the button. For Example, Mark as Current Status

property.name: recordTypeName
property.label: Name of the record type
property.description: Please provide the name of the record type if you are using record type name

property.name: showButton
property.label: Show Action Button?
property.description: Select True if you wanted to see the button, False if you do not wanted to show the action
